src:
Live Streaming Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus di Vidio
06 Nov 2019, 22:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus bisa lolos ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions musim ini dengan dua laga tersisa. Syaratnya, Bianconeri harus mengalahkan Lokomotiv Moscow di Rusia.
Juventus akan bertandang ke RZD Arena untuk menghadapi Lokomotiv Moscow pada matchday 4 Grup D Liga Champions 2019/20, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Juventus diliputi kepercayaan diri tinggi untuk lawatan ke Rusia ini. Penyebabnya adalah kemenangan 1-0 lewat gol perdana Matthijs de Ligt dalam derby melawan Torino di Serie A akhir pekan kemarin.
Juventus mengalahkan Lokomotiv 2-1 di Turin pada matchday sebelumnya. Sempat tertinggal oleh gol Aleksei Miranchuk menit 30, Juventus berbalik menang lewat sepasang gol Paulo Dybala menit 77 dan 79.
Sejauh ini, Juventus memiliki 7 poin di Grup D, sama dengan Atletico Madrid. Lokomotiv berada di peringkat 3 dengan 3 poin, sedangkan Bayer Leverkusen di posisi terbawah tanpa poin.
Lokomotiv tak boleh kalah jika ingin menjaga peluang lolos ke babak selanjutnya. Sementara itu, kemenangan akan meloloskan Bianconeri ke babak 16 besar dengan dua laga tersisa.

Simak live streaming Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus di bawah ini.
text:
Live Streaming Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus in Vidio
Nov 6 2019, 22:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus can qualify for the last 16 of the Champions League this season with two matches remaining. Conditions, the Bianconeri must defeat Lokomotiv Moscow in Russia.
Juventus will travel to the RZD Arena to face Lokomotiv Moscow on Matchday 4 in Group D of the 2019/20 Champions League, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Juventus are filled with high confidence for this trip to Russia. The reason is the 1-0 victory through Matthijs de Ligt's first goal in the derby against Torino in Serie A last weekend.
Juventus defeated Lokomotiv 2-1 in Turin on the previous matchday. Coming from behind by Aleksei Miranchuk's goal in the 30th minute, Juventus turned to win through a pair of Paulo Dybala's goals in 77 and 79 minutes.
So far, Juventus have 7 points in Group D, the same as Atletico Madrid. Lokomotiv is ranked 3 with 3 points, while Bayer Leverkusen is bottom without any points.
Lokomotiv can not lose if you want to keep the opportunity to qualify for the next round. Meanwhile, the victory will pass the Bianconeri into the last 16 with two matches remaining.

Check out live streaming Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus below.
